settings.second_title: Your fit. Your fabric. Your details.
settings.description: Create a garment that’s uniquely yours with our Made-to-Measure program. Choose from 200+ fabrics across Filarte Sartoriale, StyleBiella, Reda, and Vitale Barberis Canonico (VBC) and refine every detail—from lapels and lining to buttons and stitching. Most orders are completed in 6–8 weeks, with single or double-breasted suits.

settings.heading: What We Make:
settings.text:
Beyond suits and sports coats, our MTM program covers a broad, beautiful range of options:

Separate trousers – perfect for rounding out wedding parties and smart separates.

Vests / Waistcoats – ideal finishing piece for wedding parties and three-piece looks.

Shirts – a smart solution for longer-limbed customers and precise collar/cuff specs.

MTM chinos & chino shorts – tailored casual pieces with dress-level polish.

Overcoats – built to your proportions for layering and movement.

Tailcoats – formalwear for weddings and classical musicians.

Women’s tailored garments – precision fit across suiting, separates, and coats.

settings.heading: Filarte Sartoriale
settings.text: Contemporary suiting cloths with a clean hand, modern textures, and excellent value.

settings.heading: StyleBiella
settings.text: Refined Italian fabrics with elegant drape and versatile seasonal weights.

settings.heading: Reda
settings.text: Renowned Italian wool specialists known for rich colour, clarity, and a smooth finish.

settings.heading: Vitale Barberis Canonico
settings.text: Iconic Italian mill offering timeless twills, airy tropicals, and classic flannels.

settings.heading: Our Fabric Partners
settings.text: Filarte Sartoriale | StyleBiella | Reda | Vitale Barberis Canonico

settings.heading: The Process
settings.text:
1) Consultation & measurement: Meet with our specialist to discuss your occasion, style goals, and fit preferences. We take comprehensive measurements and note posture and balance for accuracy.

2) Choose your style: Select from 40 core styles (single- or double-breasted, notch or peak lapels, one- to three-piece options, formalwear silhouettes and more) as the foundation for your design.

3) Select the fabric: Explore 200+ fabrics from Filarte Sartoriale, StyleBiella, Reda, and VBC - ranging from lightweight tropics to textured basketweaves and refined flannels.

4) Personalise the details: Lapel width, button stance, lining, pick-stitching, pockets, pleats, cuffs, monogramming -dial in the details that speak to you.

5) Make & lead time: Your garment is cut and constructed to your specifications. Standard delivery is 6–8 weeks.

6) Final fitting & handover: Try on your finished piece in-store. We check the fine points and make any finishing tweaks so your garment feels perfect from day one.

settings.quote_text: 40 styles to start from. 200+ fabrics (Filarte Sartoriale, StyleBiella, Reda, VBC) Custom stitching & linings. Single or double-breasted. Delivery: 6–8 weeks.

settings.heading: Book Your Appointment
settings.content: Your Made-to-Measure experience is tailored around you—from the first conversation to final fitting. Book now to secure time with a specialist and start your MTM journey.
